website_summaries.verdict: The name of this golf cart says it all, as it folds quickly for use, transport, and storage. Also includes other golfer-friendly features.
pros: Earns praise for easily folding down to an extremely compact size in just a few seconds
Offers a lightweight yet tough build that's also highly adjustable to suit individual needs
cons: Doesn't have a lot of extra space for stowing small gear like keys or a phone
Some carts tend to veer to the left or right

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good Cart
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Nice and light. Folds easily and rolls nicely on the course. Only two drawbacks that I found - and these were because I did not look closely enough at the item description - my fault. 1. Does not fold down with the golf bag installed. This means you have to remove the bag first so now there are two separate items to store in the trunk. Every time you go golfing you have to add or remove the golf bag. Inconvenient. 2. The front wheel does not swivel which makes it a bit more difficult to steer along the course. All in all, a good cart for the money.
customer_reviews.author: dozey

customer_reviews.title: Constantly veers left
customer_reviews.text: Played a round with it. Disappointed with two things. First, the biggest issue is that the cart is contantly veering left. My forearms were killing me trying to keep the thing straight until finally I just tipped it back onto two wheels. Second, there is too much give in the handle. The front wheel is fixed so it needs to be lifted off the turf to turn. When you press down on the handle, it tends to give rather than lift the front wheel. Kind of flimsy. I am disappointed
customer_reviews.author: John Rice

customer_reviews.title: Low quality product and unresponsive seller. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong color. Contact the seller without a response. I used it twice and it is not good at all. It steers to the left so you a constantly having to adjust the direction. The ball holder on top is too small to fit either ball or even a normal size cell phone. The umbrella is mounted on the side of the handle, creating problems in coverage. The wheels make a rubbing sound and one is wobbling. I would return it in a second, but I have had zero luck contacting the seller. I was planning on reaching out again today.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great cart!
customer_reviews.text: Solid well constructed cart. Easy open and close. Initial assembly was quick, even without any directions.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pull cart!
customer_reviews.text: Solid, smooth, comfortable, and versatile! I was hesitant to spend the money, but SO glad I did! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is a sub par piece of crap!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product which was far m ore expensive than the two top named golf cart which are less expensive than the product I purchased. For the price IO shouild have received a prime performance Golf Cart. Using it one time the front wheel fell of a number of times in 9 holes. My golf bag did not fit on the cart. For a product in the $300 price range it is a really sub par manufactured product that is grossly overpriced. I suggest no one purchase this product for the price offered. On the company web site, I'm confident that the company provided their least expensive product at a premium price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Richards

customer_reviews.title: Like it so far
customer_reviews.text: It is light, rolls easily, folds and unfolds with one push of the button; all pluses. The wheel base is narrower than most including my last cart. I'm not sure if that is a plus or minus yet I've only used it once. I'm afraid it may tend to tip over on uneven terrain.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.text: Very nice, the easy to open and close is true, sets up nice and bag secures on it nicely. A small problem with front wheel going a little left, adjusted it once, didn't seem to help, I'm sure with my second adjust it will be fixed. Have used it 3 times definitely notice my back feels a lot better after 9 holes so I can play 9 more. Worth the investment. You do remove bag when storing, very easy to fold and store.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Cart
customer_reviews.text: this was a great purchase for my 15 yr old daughter that is in high school golf. it was her first bag cart so we were impressed. it is a little heavier than expected, folds up nicely and is easy to put together. she used it for the first time yesterday and loved it, the handle is adjustable to her height 5'2" so that is nice also. i wish however that there was some sort of locking button when it is folded down currently there is only a strap that keeps it together which is sturdy but a locking button would have been nice. product arrived on time in an undamaged box.
customer_reviews.author: tammy j jones

customer_reviews.title: It is a very sturdy cart, has great little necessities on the handle ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a very sturdy cart, has great little necessities on the handle and it folds up so easily. It folds up so small too. I am very glad I chose this cart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cart the only thing I would recommend would be ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cart the only thing I would recommend would be to enlarge the card drawer You have to fold twice to put it in when raining
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The cart is sturdy and incredibly easy to assemble -- basically you just pop on the 3 wheels. No tools required. The cart folds into a compact bundle for storage, yet opens to a full featured push cart. The elastic bag straps have quick connects that make it quick to load or remove the golf bag and double as straps to hold the folded cart closed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: You Get Far More than What You Pay For with This Cart
customer_reviews.text: This cart has been fantastic since the first day I used it. It is lightweight, compact, easy to use and has everything that you need for a golf cart. When I saw the price I had my doubts that the cart could be better than advertised, but my doubts have been silenced since I have been using it for the past month. It is lightweight, durable, and does what it needs to do. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John Bosic

customer_reviews.title: bad design for front wheel and bag fitting
customer_reviews.text: bag won't nest between claws designed to hold bottom of bag. No adjustments possible. Also this causes imbalance in steering and cart has to be wrestled around the golf course.
customer_reviews.author: Bagman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, ease of fold(good size for car)/unfold (perfect size for bag.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I usually don’t write reviews, but I did my homework on researching for a bag cart and was not disappointed with this product. I didn’t give it an overall 5 because I haven’t used it on the golf course yet, but I was so excited on the ease of putting it together, folding and unfolding, sturdiness, a perfect folded size for a large cart and helpful accessories as part of the bag. Holder for card/pencil/drink/ball/umbrella even a score counter. I kept showing it off to my husband, he was even impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and fold down
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves that this is her school colors. Adjustable handle. Easy to collapse and open up with her 5’3” frame.Downfall is she can not fit her phone into the tray. Upside water bottle for hydration on the back 9!
customer_reviews.author: Aspenchick

customer_reviews.title: Front Wheel Assemble is not snug. (too Loose)
customer_reviews.text: Unit Drifts to the left. Adjustment does not help. fully adjusted to correct issue but still goes left. Too bad for me I noticed after return date. Would not recumend
customer_reviews.author: Jah Cranks

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once, but it seems to work well. I think if I were to get another one, I would get one where the front wheel does swivel. It's not a big deal, but takes a little extra effort. My only complaint is it seems to want to veer to the left all the time. I need to see if there is an adjustment that I can make. Otherwise, very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Smith

customer_reviews.title: A Great Improvement
customer_reviews.text: Much easier way to transport golf bag/clubs around 18 holes. A great improvement over 2 wheeled cart. Bought this for my wife and she loves it. Rolls very easily. I may buy one for myself. Looks very well made, and durable. Quite light. Folds up and loads in car in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Front Wheel Bracket weld is not straight
customer_reviews.text: This would be a decent Push Cart if not for its front wheel assembly not welded on straight. very much a pain to handle when the cart veers hard to left or right(which ever way you decide to slide on front wheel) There is also no adjustment and unless you have a welder you will be dealing with it..
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lapinski

customer_reviews.title: COVID-19 Walking Support
customer_reviews.text: When our golf course opened up, the first week was walking-only, so I bought this cart. It worked great, was easy to pull and met all of my needs. I have decided to use in on our flat courses to add to the exercise. A very nicely build product.
customer_reviews.author: Edward F. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Love this card so much bought a second one for ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this card so much bought a second one for my husband. Only missing piece the front wheel doesn't swivel.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Bigger

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Just received them yesterday. We haven’t been to the course with them yet, I was a little concerned about a stationary front wheel as compared to a “swiveling” one but we put our bags/clubs on and pushed them around the front yard. The balance seems to be good to lift the front a little for tight turns yada yada so no complaints from “tiny”
customer_reviews.author: Christian Russell Poulsen

customer_reviews.title: Well made, high quality, and will get you compliments on the course.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. The front wheel does not turn like the one we bought our daughter ... but I prefer this version. Easily folds, wheels are easy to remove if required. Great gear for COVID-19 golfing and makes the walking game a real joy.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great push cart
customer_reviews.text: Love pretty much everything about it. I ordered the blue and color stands out pretty bright on wheels. I saw a red one from a mile away also so if you don’t want to be flashy get the grey. Folds with tremendous ease, compact and opens easily. My bag is a datrex and it locks right into this thing easily, which I didn’t even know from description.,
customer_reviews.author: seand3311

customer_reviews.title: AMAZON AND GOLFBESTBUY ARE ABSOLUTLY THE BEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product about a year ago and was absolutely loving the ease of opening and closing and the smooth push!. Three weeks ago a friend accidently hit the cart with her gas golf car!!! Front wheel was bent, no longer usable. Took a wild chance and email the company. After a few delightful emails and an evacuation due to Dorian, a NEW front wheel arrived in the mail. I will continue to buy anything with this company's name on the order. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: NOAH

customer_reviews.title: After 20 uses won’t collapse
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband he has used it about 20 times and now it won’t fold. The button to fold clicks but won’t fold I would not buy this didn’t last 1 season. And there is no information on the Co. to request help.
customer_reviews.author: Tli

customer_reviews.title: Easy in every way! Compact yet sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect except that assembly instructions would have made it a few minutes quicker. None the less, done in less than 0 minutes by someone who ha pretty much never seen one. It's sturdy, light fits in the back of my trunk and works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: D. Handel

customer_reviews.title: In spite of small size it folds up easily and compactly!
customer_reviews.text: This cart is very easy to maneuver and is very stable. It folds up surprisingly easily and compactly despite it’s large size. I enjoy the extra features with tee and ball holders, beverage pocket, and stroke counter. While it was easy to assemble, I wish it came with directions as it took me awhile to figure out what to do first!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Manning

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & compact
customer_reviews.text: Tended to veer to the right when pushing it. Then when I tried to change the front wheel , it veered to the left, so the front wheel is not true. But very easy to push
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Important defect
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the front wheel of this cart is bent such that the cart doesn’t go straight if you push it. The instructions on how to adjust for this aren’t addressing the problem. The wheel is clearly defective and hence the cart won’t go straight if pushed. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Humble Reader

customer_reviews.title: So easy to set up and take down
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up and take down. This was very important to us as we are in our late 70s. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Mellendorf

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My experience after 3 weeks of challenging conditions, is that this handcart appears to function (and hopefully hold up) like a similar design that is typically priced MUCH higher. Works great, folds/unfolds super easy, very compact.
customer_reviews.author: docnhh

customer_reviews.title: >Easy to fold Golf Cart
customer_reviews.text: This golf cart folds nicely to a compact size. My old 3-wheeled cart was a challenge to fit in my trunk even after removing the front wheel. This cart folds in seconds and fits in my truck easily, without removing a wheel. The cart is a little difficult to maneuver. Over all I like this a lot better than my bag boy three wheeled cart with the removal front wheel.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Not strong quick release in locked position
customer_reviews.text: Overall good cart, but now after three months, having trouble keeping quick release mechanism locked so I can lift cart on back wheels over obstacles. Very annoying and troublesome, so may have to replace with stronger locking mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G Mori Jr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I need for a lone golf trip where I can hit balls into the sand and water and cuss to myself in peace! Now, I'll only be cussing at my swing and score, and not about walking from hole to hole.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Knoblock

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble but very little storage.
customer_reviews.text: We are not mechanical, assembly is not our strength. Very easy to add the wheels and off we went. Should’ve ordered one with a golf bag attachment for essentials while walking, like golf head covers. Otherwise it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Iovino

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to unfold and fold back up.  Easily stored in trunk of car.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this push cart for my golf clubs. My bag fits perfectly, and the bag is easily put on to the cart and then removed. Cart moves easily and stops with no problem when brake is pushed. I have had others stop me ans ask me where I got the cart. Buckle up! You probably will get more orders soon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Y. L. Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Tough Day
customer_reviews.text: Pushing the cart for 18 holes wore me out, and I am in good shape. Had to fight cart all 18 holes because it kept pulling left.
customer_reviews.author: henry quartullo

customer_reviews.title: Really good.  Little bad
customer_reviews.text: Assembled with ease. Rolls smoothly. It does kinda pull left a bit but I’m sure that can be adjusted. Fits my cart bag perfectly. Another well known brand of push cart my bag rubbed the front wheel. Folds and in folds with ease. One step. Foot brake works well. Only one other issue is my cell phone/ gps doesn’t fit properly in the carrying case on top.
customer_reviews.author: donald l.

customer_reviews.title: golf push cart as described - satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: the push cart arrived as promised. It is very easy to assemble, and works well... cart pulled to left, but instructions on how to adjust this resolved the problem. very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Patterson

customer_reviews.title: As advertised and better!!
customer_reviews.text: This cart folds up easily into a easy to manage size. It has great maneuverability and easy to use. This company is fabulous to work with!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Pulls to the Right. 😡
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this cart. But I don’t. I saw a couple of reviews that said their cart pulled to the left. Mine pulled to the right. It was a constant battle keeping it going straight on flat ground. For the price I paid, I’m not ok with that. I have returned it. I will try a different brand or go back to carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Smylie

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: It took a while to arrive, but was worth the wait. It's a very well designed and manufactured, sturdy, lightweight golf push cart. Can't wait to use it though I borrowed a similar one recently and was happy with it on the course.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick S.

customer_reviews.title: stable and easy to fold, very compact.
customer_reviews.text: Great golf cart, holds the bag tight and is very stable over rough terrain. Cup holder holds water bottles fine but larger cups or thermos style may not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Rich-Boston

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this purchase. It was very easy to put together and moves smoothly on the golf course. Plenty of pockets to store all kinds of things.
customer_reviews.author: Leaann A. Gammiero

customer_reviews.title: Very good cart
customer_reviews.text: Only played a couple rounds but so far so good. Easy assembly and one move to open or close. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Darrow

customer_reviews.title: Golf push pull cart
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and folds and unfolds in a second! Using it to walk more on golf course. Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Janice K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to push, light to lift, folds easily
customer_reviews.text: Great golf push or pull golf cart. Really easy to close and lift into the car. I looked at a lot of them and I'm very happy with my selection. Like the umbrella holder too as it folds different ways or you can take off when not in use. Like the ball holder and small storage area.
customer_reviews.author: JMA

customer_reviews.title: Best pull cart! Super well made
customer_reviews.text: Love this ! Super easy to fold - looks great - bought for my Son’s golf team.
customer_reviews.author: Benzgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great cart!
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely loves it! Roles easy & folds up even easier. Good quality. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BobN4deals

customer_reviews.title: Functional/Easy Operation
customer_reviews.text: The ease of fold/unfold operation-the overall quality of this golf cart. Extremely satisfied and the price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Greg T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Push Cart
customer_reviews.text: This is a great push cart! It was very easy to assemble and folds/unfolds beautiful. Despite being light enough for me to lift in and out of my car, it is very sturdy and moves well. I couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Rees

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Great , sturdy product. Rolls very well. Quality materials. Folds easily
customer_reviews.author: bigfoot

customer_reviews.title: Don’t carry your clubs, let them ride in style
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it unfolds and closes. Great maneuverability on the course.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Martin

customer_reviews.title: good golf cart
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that it folds easy It is a bit heavier to push than I had thought but it is a handy cart. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: hanneke enthoven

customer_reviews.title: Great 3 wheeled cart
customer_reviews.text: Nice features. Strong and lightweight. Doesn't have a pivoting front wheel, but in certain situations that could be an advantage.
customer_reviews.author: David Simon

customer_reviews.title: Eco-Golf, Stylish Push Cart
customer_reviews.text: husbands birthday gift! perfect for the pandemic, no cart rule ... the guys walked... this beauty also has an umbrella stand... in last weeks 100 degree day, it was perfect! (it evens has its own shot scoring counter)
customer_reviews.author: J. Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Look great.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to using it but little bit heavy. Not light weight.
customer_reviews.author: College

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t even used it yet and I can tell it’s a superior cart. Well made, high quality product. No tools needed. Pop on the wheels, it’s ready. Folds up nicely too. I’m ordering one for my wife now that I’ve seen it.
customer_reviews.author: jonathon salzman

customer_reviews.title: Rolls well.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well. Easy to assemble. I wish front wheel turned but not a problem. Easy to fold and store.
customer_reviews.author: Papamike

customer_reviews.title: Great golf cart!
customer_reviews.text: Really great golf cart. Takes up very little space on the trunk and easy to setup for your round.
customer_reviews.author: Ray K

customer_reviews.title: Mostly there
customer_reviews.text: Functions very well. Folded, it fits in my locker along with my golf bag. Along with the cup holder, I'd like to have had a gps holder.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Really is lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It’s worth the price if you a lightweight, super easy to use pushcart. Took less than 10 minutes to assemble and everything works perfectly. So happy I chose this one!
customer_reviews.author: DS-CT Mom

customer_reviews.title: Front wheel does not swivel.
customer_reviews.text: The front wheel should swivel. Would make it much easier to maneuver. Also, after first using the cart it veered severely to the left. I read how to adjust that, and have messed with both the left and right side and still cannot get it to go straight.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K.

customer_reviews.title: IT'S A HIT!!!
customer_reviews.text: The cart fulfills all of its touted attributes: easy to assemble, easy to fold, seemingly durable! The best golfer gift for those who prefer to walk the course.
customer_reviews.author: margaret

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and looks very strong. Love the umbrella handle especially on sunny days. Electric trolley finally gave out so this'll be a new experience. So far it looks really sturdy and easy to push. The first day will decide.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t make turns .
customer_reviews.text: It does not turn easy , makes it heavy to drive . Don’t like it at all .i would like to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ana L Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Storage space
customer_reviews.text: The space for the store items is not big enough for an iPhone. The brake is not easy to release. These are basic comments from my son that used it one time.
customer_reviews.author: GLaz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great 3 wheel cart at considerable cost savings over the big names.
customer_reviews.author: scotts33

customer_reviews.title: If you have a stand up bag it takes a few times to get it hooked up
customer_reviews.text: cart is great fastest set up from a touch of the button made for non-standing bags but still works it hangs over i am glad i bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: Costco offers a better model for half the price.
customer_reviews.text: Front wheel runs against bottom of golf bag. Wish front wheel swiveled.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M Willoughby

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Waiting to use it. But, seems sturdy, light weight, easy to push. Quickly shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Billy D

customer_reviews.title: I was pleased with the overall service and value I received.
customer_reviews.text: Due to COVID-19, our Country Club is requiring that all golfers walk only and, either carry their own bags or use their own personal pull/push cart....I didn't have one, therefore, I needed to buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Space saver to fit in trunk with clubs.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic space saver when folded. Easy and quick to set up or fold down. Wished it had larger wheels to make it easier to push.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Fox

customer_reviews.title: This golf cart was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This golf cart was easy to assemble, works great on the golf course and folds up quickly and is mall enough to fit two sets of golf clubs and the folded cart into our car trunk!! Excellent and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Kanda

customer_reviews.title: Every things are perfect, but
customer_reviews.text: a little heavy and bulky comparing with comparative other goods.
customer_reviews.author: Siho Kim

customer_reviews.title: Strong, good looking, easily folds up.
customer_reviews.text: Great golf cart. Just used for first time and it torqued to the right. Have to make slight adjustment per directions to correct. It was worth paying more than the cheap ones. Overall, love it.
customer_reviews.author: anitalevine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my teenage daughter. She assembled it herself and finds it easy to use, fold, and store. Very happy with the cart.
customer_reviews.author: Shoney

customer_reviews.title: Folding golf cart
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy. The cart folds easily and is compact when folded. The bag attaches easy and the cart pushes easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, fits a 1L bottle and very simple to extend and fold away.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Good quality construction
customer_reviews.text: Folds/unfolds with 1 button press. Lightweight. Sturdy. Good quality construction. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: francisco

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and takedown
customer_reviews.text: This 3 wheel push cart folds down easily and sets up really quickly when ready to walk the Fairways! Brake on the wheel works great on slopes and this cart is very lightweight!
customer_reviews.author: Pete Michetti

customer_reviews.title: Kwik-Fold 3.0
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a year ago and just used it for the first time. It keeps pulling to the left. Is there an adjustment?
customer_reviews.author: Anthony G.

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son to use and he loves it. Easy set up and fold to store. Fits well in my car and works great for him while he plays golf on the team
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Dierig

customer_reviews.title: Folds and unfolds fast.
customer_reviews.text: Nice cart. Easy to assemble. Folds up fast. Very compact. Doesn’t take up much space in my trunk. Bungee straps are easy to adjust. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CWS

customer_reviews.title: Very good and strudy!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this cart a lot. It is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Maksim

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Assemble
customer_reviews.text: This push cart was just what I wanted...Sturdy and so easy to assemble...Already getting plenty of use out of it...
customer_reviews.author: Paul S Everett26

customer_reviews.title: Needs some tweaking
customer_reviews.text: I went out golfing for second time today. The brakes did not work 1/2 the time and my front wheel fell off once!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall good, well built product.
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be lighter. Cart prone to tipping on slight hill. Steers right when pushing. Wheels smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy the cart folds. I used a sun mountain which seemed to roll smoother and easier but for the price I'm satisfied with this cart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not swivel front wheel
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had purchased one with swivel front wheel, which easier to maneuver. The cart seems to be a bit top heavy too. It works ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: golf cart
customer_reviews.text: The cart was difficult to push the balance made the clubs seem heavy and the cart was not easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B

customer_reviews.title: Great golf pull cart
customer_reviews.text: I like the pull cart very much. It was easy to put together and is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: cats

customer_reviews.title: Ball bearing wheels.
customer_reviews.text: It rolls really easily. Lightweight but sturdy. Easy to fold and open. Really a pleasant surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory T. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to fold/unfold
customer_reviews.text: Great cart! I thought a little expensive but nice solid cart
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Super easy to pop the wheels on, unfold, adjust handle height, and hit the golf course! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Very easy to set up and fold up.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Poo
customer_reviews.text: Vary good, fast folding and unfolding worked well for me!!
customer_reviews.author: teacher

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Folds easily in just a few seconds. I bought this for my girlfriend and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Nanstad

product_meta.title: Qwik-Fold 3 Wheel Push Pull Golf CART - Foot Brake - ONE Second to Open & Close!
product_meta.description: This is the fastest folding/unfolding golf cart in the world. With the push of a button, the cart folds. Just lift the handle and the cart is ready for use. For a limited time, we are including a FREE UMBRELLA HOLDER with this purchase!
feature_bullets: FOLDS IN ONE SECOND: This Qwik-Fold push cart only takes one second to open and fold with a Patented bullet-system technology that allows the collapsible cart to open and close in one simple step. Equipped with ergonomic handle for comfort.

AIRCRAFT GRADE ALUMINUM: This collapsible cart with wheels is built with a super strong, lightweight, and sturdy aluminum frame that makes the golf pull cart easily maneuverable. It also has an attractive finish that will coordinate with any golf bag.

BUILT-IN UMBRELLA HOLDER: You won’t get stuck on the course in a downpour ill-equipped again. This golf push cart features an adjustable umbrella holder (a $39.99 value) that will keep your clubs dry and allow you to play the remainder of your round. It even works as a bit of shade under the sun.
COMPACT & LIGHTWEIGHT: This push cart opens and folds in one step, but is also compact to easily fit in the trunk of your car.

PATENTED FOOT-BRAKE SYSTEM: Simply tap the break with your foot to engage the brake, then tap with your foot again to release the brake. For maximum mobility, this folding golf cart also features ball bearing wheels for a smooth ride over any terrain.
